title: 'The Hayward Project Space & The Secret Garden': fancy serif caps - similar to Madrid {Mike Y}
content:
Please help me identify this font.  
 [http://www.valueandservice.co.uk/design/334.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202121609/http:/www.valueandservice.co.uk/design/334.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Picture 7.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202121609/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture%207_30.png) | 106.05 KB |
author: BlackDots

comments.content:
It reminds me of Red Rooster's [Madrid](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202121609/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/redrooster/madrid-rr/), but the similarity is strong only for some letters. Possibly a customization that started with Madrid?

- Mike Yanega
